system.description: When you seek to create a new alliance or improve relations with another family, roll +Reach.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: You are rebuffed and possibly offend them. Future diplomatic attempts may be harder.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: They're interested, but want significant concessions. Choose one: give them something valuable, accept obligations to them, or they only agree to a limited partnership.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: They agree to a beneficial alliance. You may call on them for aid, and they may call on you.
